name: Air Club Skopje
about: Air Club Skopje, celebrating 100 years of aviation excellence, offers a comprehensive range of aviation training programs in Macedonia. Located at the Skopje-Stenkovec sport airfield, the club provides training in aircraft, gliders, ultralight aircraft, and RC models, as well as parachute jumps from an AN-2 airplane. With a diverse fleet including Cessna 172, Piper PA-28, and gliders, Air Club Skopje caters to various training needs for Private Pilot Licenses (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licenses (CPL). The club is dedicated to safety, community, and adventure, making it a premier destination for aspiring pilots. Join us to transform your dreams of flying into reality.
